translation.en: -♪ She's True ♪ -True!
-♪ True ♪ -True!
♪ She'll wish for me and you ♪ Hero hero!
♪ She's True ♪
♪ True and the Rainbow Kingdom ♪
[Bartleby] Here, Grabbleapples.
B, come on! I told you, you need to wait.
Oh, come on. Just one.
One little Grabbleapple, please.
Not gonna happen, Bartleby.
Grabbleapple trees never give up their fruit until they start their winter nap.
translation.ko: 그래블애플 나무는 겨울잠을 자기 전까지 과실을 떨어뜨리지 않아

translation.en: True's right, Bartleby. You can't rush a Grabbleapple tree.
translation.ko: 트루 말이 맞다, 바틀비 나무를 재촉해선 안 되지

translation.en: If you take the fruit before the tree drops it,
the tree will be very upset.
As upset as my "I'm not eating Grabbleapples yet" face?
translation.ko: 아직 그래블애플을 못 먹는 제 슬픈 표정보다 더요?

translation.en: Even more so.
Ha! I'm not sure you fully saw how sad my face was.
translation.ko: 제 표정이 얼마나 슬픈지 제대로 못 보셨나 보네요

translation.en: Let me try that again.
[chuckles] It's worth the wait.
If you take the fruit off too early, it'll taste sour.
translation.ko: 과실을 너무 일찍 따면 신맛이 나

translation.en: Then you'll make your sour face. Ew!
Bubbling blue, True!
Did you just bite into a sour Grabbleapple?
No, I was showing Bartleby what happens when you do.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 신 그래블애플을 먹으면 어떻게 되는지 보여줬어요

translation.en: He's getting a liiiiiittle impatient.
Well, Bartleby, there is more to it than fresh Grabbleapples, you know.
All the leaves on the trees change color.
I love it when they go from green
to Groovy Goldenrod and Radical Radish Red.
translation.ko: 푸르던 잎이 멋진 진황색으로 변했다가 화려한 붉은색으로 변해

translation.en: Oh, I can hardly wait for the trees to go to sleep!
We don't have long to wait.
The Grand Marshal of Grabbleapplefest will be here any minute
translation.ko: 그래블애플 축제의 대원수가 곧 여기로 올 거란다

translation.en: to summon the dark grey clouds of autumn.
translation.ko: 가을의 어두운 회색 구름을 불러줄 거야

translation.en: Ah, here he is now!
Please welcome the Duke of Dour,
the Minister of Misgivings, the Groom of Gloom,
my cousin, Glummy Glooma!
[Gloomy] I'm useful?
Yay me.
More than useful!
You're the reason Grabbleapple Harvest exists!
translation.ko: 바로 네 덕분에 그래블애플 추수절이 있는걸

translation.en: Oh, goody. Let's just get this over with.
What's the big whoop about Grabbleapplefest anyway?
Everyone is excited about the change of seasons.
The cool air, the hay rides, the leaf colors.
translation.ko: 시원한 바람 건초 마차 타기, 단풍

translation.en: The coziness of bundling up.
-Don't forget the scarves! -The scarves.
But most importantly...
[both] The grabbleapples!
Ah, they can't be that good.
Nothing's that good.
You mean you've never eaten a Grabbleapple?
I don't like trying new things.
But even you would like them, Glummy.
They're sweet, crunchy, delicious.
Pffft! I'll be the judge of that.
[True] But they're not ready yet!
Sour. Mm. Pulpy.
And not delicious at all.
I can't see why anyone would like these.
Except me!
We told you they weren't ready. Their taste will change when they ripen.
translation.ko: 아직 안 익었다니까요 익으면 맛이 변해요

translation.en: I don't want them to change. They're perfect the way they are.
You're not saying what I think you're saying?
translation.ko: 설마 이상한 일 하시려는 거 아니죠?

translation.en: The fruit will stay sour, and Grabbleapplefest is canceled!
translation.ko: 이건 계속 신맛이어야 해 그래블애플 축제는 취소다

translation.en: That's... what I thought you were saying.
No, wait! Come back, clouds! And bring your glorious shade with you!
translation.ko: 안 돼, 가지 마, 구름아! 장엄한 그늘과 돌아오렴!

translation.en: Who knew sour Grabbleapples could be so blechy?
translation.ko: 신 그래블애플이 이렇게 불쾌할 줄 몰랐네

translation.en: [groans] I wonder what else I've been missing out on.
translation.ko: 내가 놓친 게 또 있나 몰라

translation.en: Um, er, yes, exactly!
Why don't you let me show some of the wonderful things in the Kingdom?
translation.ko: 내가 좀 더 보여줄까? 왕국 내에 멋진 것 중에 변하는 거?

translation.en: That change!
translation.ko: 왕국 내에 멋진 것 중에 변하는 거?

translation.en: How will I show off my new scarf in this heat?
translation.ko: 이렇게 더운데 목도리 자랑을 어떻게 해?

translation.en: Will no one think of the scarves?!
Farmer Mosser, what happens if the trees don't drop their fruit and go to sleep?
translation.ko: 모서 아저씨 나무가 과실을 안 떨어뜨리고 잠을 못 자면 어떻게 돼요?

translation.en: Oh deary me. If the trees don't have their winter nap,
translation.ko: 세상에나 나무가 겨울잠을 못 자면 내년 여름 내내 짜증 낼 거야

translation.en: they'll be grumpy all next summer.
translation.ko: 나무가 겨울잠을 못 자면 내년 여름 내내 짜증 낼 거야

translation.en: Wait! What does that mean? Break it down in terms of Grabbleapples.
translation.ko: 잠깐, 그게 무슨 말씀이세요? 쉽게 설명해주세요

translation.en: Not only will their fruit be sour this year,
it'll be sour next year and the year after that...
Don't say "and the year after that" too. Not the year after that!
translation.ko: 내후년까진 말하지 마세요 그 후도 안 돼요!

translation.en: Then we have to help them have their winter nap.
Maybe we can figure out a way to soothe the trees?
translation.ko: 나무를 달랠 방법을 찾아서 잘 달래주면

translation.en: Then they'll feel better and go to sleep.
It's possible.
There's a good tree! Easy now, easy.
Give the fruit to the nice farmhand. Come on now!
translation.ko: 이거 줄 테니 과실을 주렴 그만 울어

translation.en: Oh no! The trees have become so cranky we'll never get them to sleep now.
translation.ko: 이런 나무들이 엄청 짜증 났어 이대로는 못 재우겠다

translation.en: But then we won't get our sweet, sweet Grabbleapples.
translation.ko: 그럼 달콤하고 맛난 그래블애플을 못 먹었잖아요

translation.en: Hey! Unbranch those farmhands!
Uh-oh. We really have to do something, B.
We need Wish help. Oh, Cumulo!
To the Wishing Tree, please.
Hmm... Scarf or hat?
Hi, True and Bartleby. I'm just choosing what to wear this Grabbleapple season.
translation.ko: 안녕, 트루랑 바틀비 그래블애플 계절에 뭘 입을지 고민 중이야

translation.en: You will wear nothing! Because there isn't going to be a Grabbleapple season!
translation.ko: 입긴 뭘 입어? 그래블애플 계절이 안 올 텐데

translation.en: Glummy Glooma picked a Grabbleapple too soon and decided he likes them sour.
translation.ko: 글러미 글루마가 익지 않은 과실을 따서는 신 게 좋다고 했거든

translation.en: He called off the clouds and is withholding his gloom!
translation.ko: 구름도 다 쫓아내고 어둠을 막고 있어

translation.en: The trees are upset and refusing to drop their fruit.
translation.ko: 나무들이 화가 나서 과실을 안 떨어뜨리고 있어

translation.en: No change of seasons?
That would cause confusion for every living thing in the kingdom.
translation.ko: 그럼 왕국 내 모든 생물이 혼란을 일으킬 거야

translation.en: Let's sit... and have a think.
Okay, True. How can the Wishing Tree help you?
Well, we have to do something about the bright sun
because it's keeping the trees awake.
translation.ko: 햇빛에 나무들이 못 자니까 잘 분위기를 만들어주면

translation.en: We need something to calm them down so they'll let the farmhands go,
translation.ko: 햇빛에 나무들이 못 자니까 잘 분위기를 만들어주면 과실을 떨어뜨려줄 거고 결국 겨울잠을 자게 될 거야

translation.en: and finally have their winter nap.
translation.ko: 과실을 떨어뜨려줄 거고 결국 겨울잠을 자게 될 거야

translation.en: The Wishing Tree has heard you, True.
-It is time to get your three wishes. -I'm ready!
translation.ko: 이제 세 가지 소원을 골라 난 준비됐어

translation.en: Wishing Tree, Wishing Tree.
Please share your wonderful wishes with me!
[True] ♪ Wishing tree ♪ ♪ Share with me ♪
♪ Tiny wishes One two three ♪
♪ Wishing tree, please share with me ♪
♪ Magic power for you and me ♪
♪ Magic power in the Wishing Tree ♪
What a cluster of captivating wishes!
Now let's see what the Wishopedia says about their powers.
This is Shaydee.
Shaydee!
[Zee] Shaydee is a canopy Wish that provides shade when it blooms.
translation.ko: 셰이디는 천막 소원이야 활짝 펼쳐 그늘을 만들어줘

translation.en: You can protect the trees from the sun's glare,
then they'll know it's time to nap.
Next up is Hushabye, the singing Wish.
[Zee] Hushabye can calm you down with its sweet, soothing music.
Nice to see you again, Hushabye. You can sing the trees to sleep.
translation.ko: 다시 봐서 반가워, 자장자장 네가 자장가를 불러주면 되겠다

translation.en: And lastly we have PingPing.
[Zee] PingPing is a speaker Wish that can send sounds far away.
translation.ko: 핑핑은 스피커 소원으로 소리를 멀리까지 전달해주지

translation.en: Whatever you say into Ping A comes out of Ping B.
translation.ko: 핑 A한테 말을 하면 핑 B한테서 나와

translation.en: Here, you try.
Nice to meet you, PingPing.
Nice to meet you, PingPing.
Oh! My turn!
Oh, Bartleby is one cool cat.
Bartleby is one cool cat.
Oh, I almost forgot.
PingPing really likes being together and gets a bit nervous when it's apart.
translation.ko: 핑핑은 같이 있는 걸 좋아해서 떨어지면 불안해해

translation.en: Just like me and True.
I'm not quite sure how you'll help us, PingPing,
translation.ko: 네가 어떻게 도움이 될지 아직은 모르겠지만

translation.en: but I promise you won't be separated for long.
Zoo, zip, zap, Wishes in my pack.
-Good luck, you two. -Thanks, Zee. We'll do our best.
translation.ko: 행운을 빌어 고마워, 지, 최선을 다할게

translation.en: [pants] The sun is so shiny without the grey clouds.
translation.ko: 회색 구름이 없으니 햇볕이 너무 뜨거워

translation.en: I think it might be time to take off your scarf.
Never!
Soonish?
Okay, now. Whew.
-[wailing] -Do you hear crying?
Yup, I hear crying alright.
I can't tell if it's the trees or the farmhands.
Either way, sounds like Farmer Mosser needs our help. Let's go!
translation.ko: 누가 됐든 모서 아저씨가 도움이 필요하시겠어 어서 가자

translation.en: Alright, B. We need to calm them down.
translation.ko: 좋았어, 비 울음을 그치게 해야 해

translation.en: Right. Wait. The farmhands or the trees?
Hmm... Both?
Time for my first wish.
Zip, Zap, Zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Shadee! Wish come true!
Okay, Shadee. You need to get above the trees.
[True] Higher!
[True] Oh no! Shadee's stuck! He opened too soon.
translation.ko: 이런, 셰이디가 꼈어 너무 일찍 펼쳤어

translation.en: He has to be higher than the trees to give them shade.
translation.ko: 나무보다 높이 올라가서 그늘을 쳐줘야 하는데

translation.en: How will we get him out of there?
We could climb up the trees if they weren't so flaily.
translation.ko: 나무들이 휘젓지만 않으면 우리가 올라가도 되지

translation.en: Excuse me, Grabbleapple tree?
-Would you let us climb up you? -[wails]
It's no use, True. They're too upset to listen to you.
translation.ko: 소용없어, 트루 너무 화나서 듣지도 않아

translation.en: But they might listen to a lullaby.
Time for my second Wish.
Zip, Zap, Zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, Hushabye! Wish come true!
Okay, Hushabye.
We need you to sing a lullaby to help those cranky trees get to sleep.
translation.ko: 저 뿔난 나무들이 자도록 자장가를 불러줘

translation.en: -Do you think you can do that? -Uh-huh.
Okay, B, throw your shade!
Hey, Mr. and/or Miss Tree,
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 나무님 셰이디를 꺼내줄 수 있게

translation.en: can you give me a boost up high so I can help unstick Shadee?
translation.ko: 안녕하세요, 나무님 셰이디를 꺼내줄 수 있게 저 좀 올려주시겠어요?

translation.en: Shadee, can you collapse for a minute, please?
Spread your wings, Shadee!
Good job, B. Look, it's working!
They're asleep.
Do you think it's safe to pick them now?
[whispers] I wouldn't try it.
No! No! No!
No one do anything loud.
We can't not make noise forever.
translation.ko: 평생 소리를 안 낼 순 없어

translation.en: Not forever, just until the season changes.
And for that, it looks like we need to find Glummy.
translation.ko: 그러려면 글러미를 찾아야 할 것 같아

translation.en: -Find Glummy! Good idea! -Shhhhh!
Also, a good idea would be for you to come with me.
translation.ko: 너도 같이 가주면 또 좋은 생각이겠는걸

translation.en: Um... [whispers] Agreed.
[softly] Oh, Cumulo!
Try and keep it down, Cumulo. The trees are trying to sleep.
translation.ko: 조용히 날아야 해, 큐물로 나무들이 자는 중이야

translation.en: Glummy's swamp is much sunnier than usual.
He cannot be okay with that.
Maybe that will help us convince him to bring the clouds back.
Rainbow King. Where's Glummy?
He's in his stump and won't come out.
translation.ko: 이 그루터기 안에서 나올 생각을 안 한다

translation.en: I tried to convince him to bring the clouds back and change the seasons.
translation.ko: 구름을 다시 불러 계절을 바꾸게 해달라고 했어

translation.en: And?
Oh, right. It's still sunny. I guess he wasn't convinced.
translation.ko: 그렇죠, 여전히 화창하니 그럴 마음 없나 보네요

translation.en: I did my best to show him that change was a good thing.
translation.ko: 난 변화가 좋은 거란 걸 최선을 다해 보여줬어

translation.en: I showed him how Slipperslugs spin cocoons and turn into Slippermoths.
translation.ko: 슬리퍼 슬러그가 고치를 지어 슬리퍼 모스가 되는 걸 보여줬지

translation.en: But Glummy liked the feel of Slipperslug slime
translation.ko: 그런데 글러미는 슬리퍼 슬러그의 점액이 좋다며

translation.en: and thought it would be better if Slipperslugs stayed Slipperslugs.
translation.ko: 슬리퍼 슬러그는 그냥 슬리퍼 슬러그여야 한다는 거야

translation.en: I showed him how Bumblybees took nectar from the Stinkadora daisies
translation.ko: 다음은 범블리 벌이 스팅커도라 데이지의 넥타로

translation.en: and made it into honey.
He said he'd never really stopped to smell the Stinkadora daisies...
translation.ko: 글러미는 스팅커도라 데이지의 향을 맡은 게 처음이라며

translation.en: and thought the Bumblybees should leave the Stinkadoras alone.
translation.ko: 범블리 벌이 넥타를 가져가면 안 된다는 거야

translation.en: Every time I tried to show him how something changed for the better,
translation.ko: 변해서 더 좋아지는 걸 보여주려고 할 때마다

translation.en: he wanted to keep it the way it was.
Now he's inside having a good sulk, soaking his feet in a bowl of damp.
translation.ko: 지금은 이 안에 들어가 한껏 담그고 있어 축축한 그릇 안에 발을 담그고 있지

translation.en: But we need him to come back to the orchard!
Maybe we can get him to come out with some of his favorite things.
translation.ko: 글러미가 좋아하는 걸로 나오게 할 수 있을지 몰라요

translation.en: Go away. I'm busy being grumpy about how bright it is.
translation.ko: 저리 가 날이 너무 화창한 걸 투덜대느라 바쁘니까

translation.en: You know what would make it less bright?
Big grey clouds!
-Smooth! -[chuckles]
Don't you want to come out and look for some Slipperslug slime?
translation.ko: 슬리퍼 슬러그의 점액을 보러 가지 않으실래요?

translation.en: Hm. Got some already.
How about picking some Stinkadora daisies?
I hear they make a really awful salad!
Maybe tomorrow.
If you change your mind...
-I won't. -We'll be at the orchard.
translation.ko: - 혹시 마음 바뀌시면... - 안 바뀌어 과수원으로 오세요!

translation.en: [sighs] This just doesn't feel like Grabbleapplefest.
It feels like Shushfest.
Maybe now that the trees have been sleeping for a while,
it might be safe to pick the fruit.
Well...
Don't cry, Shadee!
You're doing your best in a hard situation.
translation.ko: 넌 힘든 상황에서 최선을 다하고 있어

translation.en: I'm sorry, Farmer Mosser, we tried to help the trees,
translation.ko: 죄송해요, 모서 아저씨 나무를 도와주려고 했지만

translation.en: but even the Wishes can't do it without Glummy.
Then it really is hopeless?
I've had crops that were too dry, too wet, too weedy,
translation.ko: 너무 말랐거나 축축하거나 허약한 작물은 봤어도

translation.en: but I've never had one that was too cranky.
♪ Oh no the Grabbleabbleapple trees Just mope and pout ♪
translation.ko: 오, 그래블 애블 애플 나무가 속상해 뾰로통하구나

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause the sun's so suniunny And it's too bright out ♪
translation.ko: 태양이 너무 밝게 비춰 날이 화창하니까

translation.en: Blue begonias!
I've never heard Farmer Mosser so low.
translation.ko: 저렇게 낮은 노래를 부르는 건 처음이구나

translation.en: He's about as low as you can go. And I'm a limbo champion.
♪ I've got that long-faced Sour Grappleapple blues ♪
If Glummy could only hear his song, he'd be very happy indeed.
translation.ko: 글러미가 이 노래를 들으면 무척 기뻐할 텐데

translation.en: Or sad.
Maybe that's how we can get Glummy to come back to the orchard!
translation.ko: 그렇게 해서 글러미를 과수원으로 데려오면 되겠어요

translation.en: We can use PingPing to let Glummy hear Famer Mosser singing.
Then he'll want to hear more and come back to the orchard.
translation.ko: 더 듣고 싶어서 과수원으로 돌아올 거야

translation.en: Time for my third Wish.
Zip, zap, zoo, I choose you!
Wake up, PingPing, wish come true!
Uh-oh. Don't they have to separate to work?
Remember what Zee said? They get nervous when they're apart.
translation.ko: 지가 한 말 기억해? 떨어져있으면 불안해한대

translation.en: Don't worry, you'll be back together in no time.
translation.ko: 걱정 마, 금세 다시 같이 있게 될 거야

translation.en: You just have to split up for a little bit to help us with Grabbleapplefest.
translation.ko: 아주 잠깐만 떨어져서 축제를 열게 도와줘, 괜찮지?

translation.en: -Sounds good? -Uh-huh.
♪ Oh no the Grabbleabbleapple trees Just mope and pout ♪
translation.ko: 오, 그래블 애블 애플 나무가 속상해 뾰로통하구나

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause the sun's so suniunny And it's too bright out ♪
translation.ko: 태양이 너무 밝게 비춰 날이 화창하니까

translation.en: Come on B, let's go.
Oh, Cumulo!
True, um, I hate to bring this really sad day any lower,
translation.ko: 트루, 이 슬픈 날을 더 슬프게 하긴 싫지만

translation.en: but even if Glummy comes back, do you think he'll bring back the clouds?
translation.ko: 글러미가 돌아간다고 해도 구름을 다시 불러줄까?

translation.en: I'm sure he will, B. He just needs the right motivation.
translation.ko: 분명히 그럴 거야 올바른 동기만 있으면 돼

translation.en: Glummy, I brought something I think you'll really like.
translation.ko: 글러미, 진짜 좋아할 만한 뭔가를 가져왔어요

translation.en: [Glummy] Go away. I told you I don't like trying new things.
translation.ko: 저리 가 말했잖아, 난 새로운 게 싫다고

translation.en: But you like the sour Grabbleapple that you tried, remember?
translation.ko: 하지만 새로운 그래블애플은 먹어보고 좋아했잖아요 기억나죠? 이건 더 좋아요

translation.en: This is even better! I mean... worse.
translation.ko: 기억나죠? 이건 더 좋아요 아니... 더 나빠요

translation.en: ♪ Oh no the Grabbleabbleapple trees... ♪
translation.ko: 오, 그래블 애블 애플 나무가 속상해...

translation.en: It's Farmer Mosser.
He's sad because the Grabbleapple trees can't sleep.
translation.ko: 그래블애플 나무가 잠을 못 자서 슬프대요

translation.en: Hm. It would go great with a sour Grabbleapple.
Wish I had one.
You can get one if you come back to the orchard.
translation.ko: 과수원으로 가시면 하나 얻으실 수 있죠

translation.en: And you can listen to Farmer Mosser sing up close.
translation.ko: 모서 농부 아저씨의 노래도 가까이서 듣고요

translation.en: That's too much work.
Just leave the music box by my window.
translation.ko: 그냥 그 뮤직박스나 창가에 두고 가

translation.en: I'm sorry, Glummy, but this little Wish needs to get back to its other half.
translation.ko: 안타깝게도 이 소원은 자기 반쪽에게 돌아가야 해요

translation.en: So, if you want to hear more gloom, and a little doom,
translation.ko: 우울하고 울적한 노래를 더 듣고 침울하려면

translation.en: you've got to come out of your room!
See what I did there? I rhymed.
Wait! I need to hear more of that woeful wailing.
translation.ko: 기다려 그 비통한 절규를 더 듣고 싶어

translation.en: [groans] Oh! That sun is too bright.
It's working, B. Glummy is following the music.
translation.ko: 효과가 있어, 비 글러미가 노래를 따라오고 있어

translation.en: ♪ I got the sour Grabbleapple ♪
♪ Sour Grabbleapple blues ♪
That was terrible. Sing it again.
True! You brought Glummy back!
Does this mean the season will change?
Sad faces, sad music, sour apples.
translation.ko: 슬픈 얼굴, 슬픈 노래, 신 과실...

translation.en: Why would I want to change anything that's so perfectly gloomy?
translation.ko: 완벽하게 우울한데 이걸 내가 왜 바꾸는데?

translation.en: Because it's not perfect for everyone else.
The kingdom needs you to bring the autumn weather.
Are you going to keep bothering me until I bring back the clouds?
translation.ko: 내가 구름을 다시 부를 때까지 나 괴롭힐 거야?

translation.en: Tell him yes! Tell him yes!
No, Glummy, it's totally up to you.
But changing the seasons would make everyone happy.
translation.ko: 하지만 가을이 오면 모두 행복할 거예요

translation.en: I only brought the autumn clouds because I liked them.
translation.ko: 아까 가을 구름을 부른 건 내가 그 구름을 좋아해서야

translation.en: I've never done anything just for someone else.
translation.ko: 다른 누군가를 위해 뭘 해본 적이 없어

translation.en: That would be a pretty big change for sure,
and we know you don't like change.
But maybe you'll find out you like doing something new,
translation.ko: 새로운 걸 좋아한다는 걸 알게 되실지도 몰라요

translation.en: like when you tried the sour Grabbleapple.
[sighs] Well, that did turn out alright.
Eh... I suppose it is too bright.
-[True groans] -Here, True, to keep warm.
translation.ko: 이거 해 - 따뜻해질 거야 - 괜찮아, 네가 해

translation.en: It's okay. You keep it.
Thanks for your help, Shadee, Hushabye, and PingPing.
Now, back in the pack!
It's happening! Glummy's clouds are making the trees sleepy.
translation.ko: 시작됐다! 구름 덕분에 나무들이 졸린가 봐

translation.en: Long live the gloom!
Sorry. [whispers] Long live the gloom.
Let's give them the nudge test.
They've started winter nap.
So then why are we still whispering?
You're right! Nothing can wake them 'til spring!
translation.ko: 그렇구나 이제 봄까지 깨지 않을 거야

translation.en: ♪ Oh yes the trees have started Their winter snooze ♪
♪ And the leaves... ♪
Welcome to Scarf Season, everyone!
[Farmer Mosser] We sure did!
Yes! Fruit catching time!
Here, Glummy, I know happy sounds are a little hard on your ears.
translation.ko: 여기요, 글러미 행복한 소리를 듣기 힘든 거 알아요

translation.en: The scarf isn't really my style. Too jazzy.
translation.ko: 목도리는 나랑 안 어울려 너무 화려해

translation.en: But... thank you.
Look! The symphony of color is about to begin!
Well, everybody's happy.
My work is done. Yippee. I'm outta here.
Glummy! Wait!
Thanks for bringing your cloud game. It was really nice of you.
Whatever, just don't let it get around.
Here, B, have a cup of Grabbleapple cider.
Grabbleapple cider? But we always drink Grabbleapple cocoa!
translation.ko: 그래블애플 주스? 원래 그래블애플 코코아 마시잖아

translation.en: I put a mushmallow in it too. Try it!
[True] Change can be good!
Mmmm! Mmmm! Change is delicious!
Oh, Bartleby!
♪ Oh yes the trees have started Their winter snooze ♪
♪ And the leaves will change their hues ♪
♪ We cured the Grabbleapple ♪
♪ The Grabbleapple blues ♪
